sourcesContent:
import { Container } from '../style'; const TagprosTeachers101 = () => { return (

What we offer to Teachers

We offer a platform for teachers to train themselves in virtual education and showcase their teaching skills to:{' '}

  • Get US exposure for training and career opportunities
  • Qualify for teaching certification in the United States
  • Access local and international communities of learners

You will be creating classes on our platform and these classes can be purchased by Tagpros parents and learners. You will be earning 70% of the payments (taxes not yet included) and the money will be sent via Paypal. You will be the one to set the price for your classes.

 

US Teaching Opportunity

By teaching on our platform, you will get the chance to be observed and even hired by US School Districts that we have partnered with. To join this program, you must teach for at least 6 months on our platforms with a minimum of{' '} 4 learners per class and at least one session per week.

 

How to become a Tagpros Teacher

You only need to{' '} create an account {' '} on our website to join Tagpros. Make sure to create a teacher’s account during the registration. If you choose not to sign up using Gmail or Facebook, you will be prompted to verify your email address. Once you have registered and{' '} logged in , you will have to submit a teacher application before creating a class.

 

Teacher Application

The teacher application allows us to get to know you more and have an idea of what you want to teach. You will be required to put the following:

  • Basic Information
  • Class Descriptions
  • 3-5-minute sample class video

Once you have submitted your teacher application, we will review the documents and will get back to you after 3-5 business days. If your application was denied, you can still try again. We allow up to 3 submissions.

 

Creating a Class

Before you are allowed to create a class, you will first have to enter your PayPal email in the “Payout Account” section of your dashboard. To create a class, click the “+Create a New Class” located on the Teacher’s Tool. This can be seen on the left side of your dashboard. The class details will be as follows:

 

Preparing for your First Class

For our live classes, we use{' '} Jitsi {' '} as our live video platform to facilitate the discussions. For this, you will need to have a webcam, microphone, and a reliable internet connection. To learn more about Jitsi, we encourage you to watch this video. However, certain teachers may require certain materials for the class to be maximized.

 

Contact{' '} customercare@tagpros.us {' '} if you have any questions or concerns. We are always happy to help.

); }; export default TagprosTeachers101;
